articles.content: The Miami Dolphins social-media team sought to highlight the teams new passing combination when it posted on May 11 a brief Twitter video of quarterback Tua Tagovailoa throwing a long pass to wide re… [+5076 chars]

articles.author: Nick Selbe
articles.title: Tim Anderson Recalls Incident When Josh Donaldson Called Him ‘Jackie’ in 2019 - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: Anderson: “I told him, we never have to talk again.”
articles.content: White Sox shortstop Tim Anderson spoke Tuesday about the confrontation between him and Yankees third baseman Josh Donaldson, in which the latter referred to Anderson as “Jackie” during the weekend me… [+1499 chars]

articles.author: Joe Nguyen
articles.title: Blues’ David Perron fined $5K for cross-check on Avalanche’s Nazem Kadri in Game 4 - The Denver Post
articles.description: The NHL on Monday fined Blues left wing David Perron $5,000 for his cross-check on Avalanche center Nazem Kadri during Colorado’s 6-3 win in Game 4 on Tuesday.
